name: Sgt. Hammer
title: Siege Tank Operator
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds. Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back. Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Neosteel Plating
abilities.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

heroics.name: Blunt Force Gun
heroics.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to enemies in its path.

heroics.name: Napalm Strike
heroics.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

original.name: Sgt. Hammer
original.title: Siege Tank Operator
original.description: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.
original.shortDescription: A long-range, Physical Damage dealer that needs protection from allies.

baseHeroInfo.name: Sgt. Hammer
baseHeroInfo.title: Siege Tank Operator
baseHeroInfo.description: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A long-range, Physical Damage dealer that needs protection from allies.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Siege Mode
trait.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

abilities.name: Spider Mines
abilities.description: Create 3 mines that arm after 1.25 seconds. Mines detonate when an enemy comes in range, dealing 96 damage to nearby enemies and Slowing them by 25% for 1.5 seconds. Siege Mode: Cast range increased by 100%.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in front of Sgt. Hammer and knock them back. Siege Mode: Radius increased by 50%.

abilities.name: Neosteel Plating
abilities.description: Gain 25 Armor for 2 seconds. Siege Mode: Grants 100% more Armor.

abilities.name: Thrusters
abilities.description: Increase Movement Speed by 60% for 4 seconds. Thrusters are always active while at the Altar. Activating Thrusters cancels Siege Mode.

heroicAbilities.name: Blunt Force Gun
heroicAbilities.description: Fire a missile across the battlefield, dealing 500 damage to enemies in its path.

heroicAbilities.name: Napalm Strike
heroicAbilities.description: Deals 164 damage on impact, and leaves a napalm area that deals 50 damage per second. Lasts for 4 seconds.

trait.description: Activate to enter Siege Mode. While in Siege Mode, Basic Attacks deal 20% more damage, have 100% increased range, and deal 25% of their damage as splash damage around the target.

skins.name: Siege Tank Operator
skins.description: Sergeant Bama "the Hammer" Kowalski has served some of the toughest tours around the Koprulu sector. The roar of her siege tank's shock cannon strikes fear right into the heart of the toughest of warriors... including some of her allies.

skins.name: Master Sgt. Hammer
skins.description: With as many kills as she'd racked up on the battlegrounds of the Nexus, Sgt. Hammer deserved her promotion to Master Sergeant... even if she promoted herself.

skins.name: Neon War World Sgt. Hammer
skins.description: The battle has raged across War World III for years. No one remembers who fired the first shot, but Sgt. Bama the Hammer is fully confident she'll be the one firing the last.

skins.name: Sgt. Doomhammer
skins.description: The Iron Demolisher is the pride of the orcish war machine. Sgt. Grimina Doomhammer was given the honor of piloting it in recognition of her years of service in the Arathi Basin battlefield.

skins.name: War World Sgt. Hammer
skins.description: The battle has raged across War World III for years. No one remembers who fired the first shot, but Sgt. Bama the Hammer is fully confident she'll be the one firing the last.
